content.detailedDescription:
I don't know if this was an ufo or not and just accepted it as a falling comet or something until i saw the ufo films on tv.  i was driving home late at night from my grandchildren's home, and just as i got near my house, i looked straight down the street into the sky and saw this very bright fireball in what appeared to be a fast moving downward motion, with the streak of a fiery tail behind it.  the part i later thought about was that it was larger than any tiny falling comet i have seen in the past, way up in the atmosphere.  this looked close to earth and it was a bright light green color. the color around the edges and in the tail were more of a light yellow.  it was moving very fast, so i was not able to study it but a second or two.  i didn't think much of it at the time except to think what a neat experience to see something like that from the heavens.
then, later, when watching a segment on the history channel about the ufo sightings by two different men and the films they took, it came to my mind that this object looked very similar.  so thought i would report it. i had to guess at the date and the time (they are approximate) because i did not think of any significance relating to it until some time later (approx. 3 weeks). 
thank you,
jacqueline schroller
content.summary: Bright green fireball shape with yellow edges and bright tail.

content.detailedDescription:
In 1965 in the late evening two witness's (boys ages 16 and 14) were walking east toward north main street in rockford illinois to the local root beer barrel.  the 16 year old witness interviewed, now 58 years old, glanced to the west and saw a small light blink about 50 yards away and 50 yards up.  the two boys turned to look at the light which started to decend directly towards them blinking at a rate of about once every three seconds.  the witness estimated the speed of the object at about 1 foot per second.  the object approached to about chest level and then started circling them at the same rate of speed for about 15 revolutions.  the object departed on a reverse course of it's entry but with an alternating left right zig-zag course blinking until they lost sight of it. 

the object was described as about 5mm in diameter, a matte black sphere with four segments.  the segments were quarter spheres but were not delineated by lines or indentations.  the lower rear quarter away from the direction of motion emitted a light green light about once every three seconds that lasted less than a second in duration.  the object approached to within three feet, close enough to reach out and touch it.  the boys were afraid of the object and decided to toss one of their 4th of july firecrackers at it.  this they did tossing it near the object.  the object then left on the aforementioned zig-zag course. 

the younger witness does not remember the incident and was not present.

this older witness also gave field investigator richard sherertz and myself a chapter from a book that his daughter in law is writing that described a similar sized ufo that blinked and came through a closed glass window.  the older witness seemed to think that this sighting twelve years later was the same object that he had seen.  i can't speak to the similarity without interviewing the daughter in law but i did relate a ball lightening incident that i had reported to me and that it also had penetrated a closed glass thermopane window.

i mention this to indicate that this family has had some experience with ufo sightings.
content.summary: 5mm diameter sphere with four segments emited yellow-green light from lower rear segment circled around witness 15 times at 3 feet away

content.detailedDescription:
Silent green light, looked like star but not traveling like star. straight line- very fast! 

my husband was standing on the front porch while the dogs went potty. he witnessed a white round light traveling east to west that disappeared mid flight. was not traveling up or down, straight line east to west. soundless. he called me to come outside and was seemingly stunned. while he was describing it to me we noticed a green light traveling from the area where it disappeared. it traveled towards us and above us and beyond our sight (greater than 100 feet up). same east to west path at an extremely high rate of speed and no sound whatsoever. 

we live in airport flight path and are used to planes- this was *not* a plane. no red or white light with it and light did not flash at all. airplane lights flash and that is why this caught our attention. we thought maybe it was a star until we realized it was moving in a horizontal line- and way to fast. we've seen things that have made us wonder before but we could chalk it up to other things. this was not a plane, for sure. and we cannot come up with a feasible description for this object. 

the next day- military helicopters were flying in formation tracing the same path (but going the opposite way). i don't know if that's related or not, but i've haven't seen military aircraft out there since we had tornados in 1997. none before, none since. it was very out of the ordinary.
content.summary: Silent green light, looked like star but not traveling like star. straight line- very fast!

content.detailedDescription:
(time: mid october 1980, place: hoboken nj, 1 block west of washington street.) arriving back from dinner we drove around the block a few times looking for a place to park legally. finally parked, i was unloading a few things from the trunk, when my fiance, looked up at the full moon and said, "isn't that odd; i've never seen stars like that next to the moon." we were looking at the moon high over nyc from hoboken nj.

i looked up and next to the full moon on a clear cloudless night, which was high in the sky, there were 6 star-like dash lines. the objects appeared to be at an extemely high altitude, if not out of the earth's atmosphere. when i first looked the objects were stationary. then they began to move, and changed their formation of 6 objects side by side to 6 objects stacked on top of each other. then the formation rotated vertically, with the bottom object rotated to the top of the stack, top to the bottom. then one by one from the top of the stack, they took off at a phenomenal speed heading west, but the objects flew in a mild "s" pattern almost like a snake path, instead of flying in a straight line. they all kept an equal distance from each other as they headed west. at the altitude they appeared at this was a faster speed than any conventional aircraft could fly at. i would say 10,000 mph + to take a wild guess. we lost sight of the objects after they had flown west. the entire time the objects appeared at a very high altitude, most likely out of the earths atmosphere.

as we watched this, a crowd of about a dozen people had gathered to watch  this spectacle in the sky. it was so strange that the hair was standing up on my head.  

the next day we made numerous phone calls to local autorities and airports and news stations trying to find out if anyone else had witnessed this odd display in the sky the night before, and there was no positive response from anyone.
content.summary: 6 objects in formation, at high altitude next to the moon, changing formation, then flying to the west at high speed swerving back and forth in s-path

content.detailedDescription:
I already reported this to the national mufon organization, but i wanted to also report it to the los angeles mufon and also i created a representation of what this looked like using photoshop which i will attach to the report. i didn't do that for my report to the national organization. 

i was sitting outside in my backyard listening to coast to coast talking about seeing ufos with night vision goggles and wishing that a ufo would appear in my sky as it had done another time when i was out there. i saw a few airplanes go by on their approach to santa monica airport, and i also saw a helicopter, but mostly i was staring at the big dipper and wondering if i could eventually see the little dipper, but alas there's too much light in la for that these days.

 then out of the north east i saw a flock of birds, or so i thought approaching me. as i watched them get larger, i realized they were glowing ovals and not birds at all. they glowed a soft multi-color or mish mash of color, not clear white, but as they were overhead i could see that they were a formation of ovals and not birds at all. i started screaming for my son to come outside, but he didn't hear me. it passed directly overhead and made no noise at all. usually a flock of birds make some squawking noise. and these were glowing ovals and not birds. the whole formation sort of looked like a boomerang shape but not exactly as it was more extended on both ends so as to be in the shape of a sweatheart neckline. but the shape was not solid, it was made up of many glowing ovals and it undulated a bit like a snake or maybe more like a butterfly only gently moving its wings. i watched it until it disappeared into the brightness of the moon which is to the west of me right now. i held up my hand and at arm's length it was about the length of two pointer fingers when it was directly above me, or maybe a little bigger directly above me and that was the length that it was when it was angled above me.

i was so excited and when travis (my son) finally answered my screaming he was too late because it had disappeared into the bright moonlight. i went inside and reported it to mufon and then i made a representation of it in photoshop so i could send in a picture of what it seemed to look like. i needed a hazy la sky to use as a background but couldn't find one, so you have to use your imagination. i think i may have drawn too many ovals relative to the entire length of the thing. it may have been fewer and larger ovals. the colors were non-distinct, but definitely not solid white. it was kind of a mish mash of color there, but seemed to glow more teals to gold so that's what i used here.
content.summary: Looked like an undulating flock of birds floating silently across the sky

content.detailedDescription: While on the boardwalk in santa cruz, ca, i was looking to the north from the sky tram ride. i noticed a disc hovering in the air at approximately 10,000 feet above and approximately 10 to 20 miles away. it appeared as a quarter in the sky. the day was clear with no cloud cover. the white objet was very difficult see even with the clear blue background. there was no sound. i watched it for a minute to make sure i could not identify the object as a known air craft. i pointed it out to my fiance and she also saw it. we watched it for a minute hovering and then it began to move to the east. very slowly at first and then it seemed to speed up in two intervals. first it began to move fast and then in the second interval it sped up and went out of sight. this speed transition took place in about 3 seconds. i asked her if she had seen the same thing? she said she had and we just sat there in amazement. my back ground is that i own my own buisness and i have been flying and flying in air craft my whole life. both of my grand fathers were pilots and i fly myself.I have also been an avid aircraft enthusiest my whole life designing and building small aircraft. i know how conventional air craft fly and this craft exhibited no know flight behavior.
content.summary: Ufo sighted in santa cruz california.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my kitchen, browsing the web on my laptop, and looked out the window and saw something in the sky, approx. 30 degrees above the horizon.   the shape of it looked unusual to me, so i grabbed my digital camera and went outside.  the object wasn't moving, didn't make any noise.  i pointed my camera at it, zoomed in as much as possible and took a few shots.  i watched it for a couple of minutes, and it did not move at all.  when i saw it, it looked white, almost like a glowing grain of rice in the sky, a few degrees off-vertical from my viewpoint. i thought it was something relatively close-by, not a star.  my perception was it was maybe 5-7 miles away.  after watching it for a while,  i was tired so i went back inside and went to bed.  

the next day i transferred the pictures to my laptop and only one of them captured the object.  i was surprised to see it was actually multi-colored (it appeared white to the naked eye).  as you can see in the picture, if you zoom in 100%, stars show up without motion blur.  this leads me to believe the multi-colored object also has little or no motion blur.

if you have some idea of what i saw, i'd appreciate your opinion.

thanks,

dan cogswell
content.summary: Saw multi-colored still object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside in my backyard listening to coast to coast talking about seeing ufos with night vision goggles and wishing that a ufo would appear in my sky as it had done another time when i was out there. i saw a few airplanes go by on their approach to santa monica airport, and i also saw a helicopter, but mostly i was staring at the big dipper and wondering if i could eventually see the little dipper, but alas there's too much light in la for that these days. then out of the north east i saw a flock of birds, or so i thought approaching me as i watched them get larger, i realized they were glowing ovals and not birds at all. they glowed a soft multi-color or mish mash of color, not clear white, but as they were overhead i could see that they were a formation of ovals and not birds at all. i started screaming for my son to come outside, but he didn't hear me. it passed directly overhead and made no noise at all. the whole formation sort of looked like a boomerang shape but not exactly as it was more extended on both ends so as to be in the shape of a sweatheart neckline. but the shape was not solid, it was made up of many glowing ovals and it undulated a bit like a snake or maybe more like a butterfly only gently moving its wings. i watched it until it disappeared into the brightness of the moon which is to the west of me right now. i held up my hand and at arm's length it was about the length of two pointer fingers when it was directly above me, or maybe a little bigger directly above me and that was the length that it was when it was angled above me.
content.summary: Thought it was a graceful flock of glowing birds undulating across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
resending image # 019.  your site said it had to be dumped. i don't know how that is possible.


please do not post these photos on the mufon site. they are for mufon to review only.
content.summary: Objects unable to see with the eye while shooting pictures of the moon.

content.detailedDescription:
I have numerous photos that have objects in the pictures from this day, that were not visable to the eye while taking the photos. some are like these three cylinder shapes. 

i have others that are spheres in formation. if you would like to see those, just email me.  i took all the photos on burst mode, so the camera took 4 or 5 photos at a time.  the objects appear in one photo and are gone in the next photo, with exception to the objects that are moving in formation for numerous photos. i can email those to you if you like, but i will give you these three to start with and hopefully explain or id. 

i saved the whole series of 244 photos to a cd.

please do not post these photos on the mufon site. they are for mufon to review only.
content.summary: Objects unable to see with the eye while shooting pictures of the moon.

content.detailedDescription:
I had not forgotten this event but had considered it important to only myself until i saw the ufo hunter program the other night in which it was released that ufo sighting in the stephenville area actually began to increase in the beginning of december. 
   at this point, i am still a bit unsure of the date and time, but i can find out more precise information if needed. let me disclose that i am ex-military, with 4 years experience with, on, and around military aircraft...Everything from a-6's to u-2's. that being said, i am at a loss for what i witnessed this night. 
   it was a thursday night and i was traveling to my deer lease on the edge of brown county. i live in dallas, but i had been down south the days leading up and to thursday for work. i decided to take friday off to enjoy a three day weekend deer hunting.  
   i turned off of mills county road 574 outside the town of goldthwaite and began heading north on mills county road 531. because i was near the county line dividing mills and brown county it's not possible to tell if i was still on 531 or brown county road 267 where the event happened. as you travel from mills county on cr 531 into brown county, the road then becomes cr 267. it was very dark and i had never traveled from this particular direction before, so it is hard to determine where exactly i was in relationship to recognizable landmarks.
   as i was traveling northward, i suddenly noticed a brilliantly bright white light flickering through the darkened silhouette of trees. it was on the left side of the road which in relation would be northwest i'm guessing, and it appeared to be approximately 100-200 yards ahead of me, again on the left side of the road.  i slowed down and rolled down my window to investigate. the light was intensely bright with the primary color being white with hues or flashes of orange or red. it was so bright and appeared with such little warning that my first thought was that a plane had just crashed. i began to try to rationalize the information but became more puzzled when i realized that i hadn't heard an explosion or and audible signature of a crash of any kind. this is an extremely rural area that is very sparsely populated. as i continued slowly ahead i kept trying to find a break in the trees to get a better look at the object. at this point i was still trying to find and evidence that this was not what i was beginning to think it was, a ufo. i thought for a second that it could be an electrical fire. but i quickly dismissed this when first i didn't hear the patented arcing and tracking noise that accompanies a high voltage phase fault, nor did i see the characteristic blue-white flashing flames. i finally stopped after i had gotten almost parallel with the light and kept squinting through the openings in the brush and trees. suddenly, as quickly as it had appeared, it stopped with-out a trace. i turned off my truck and listen as intently as i could with my mind racing for an explanation. i grabbed my cell and called a friend of mine who is familiar with the area. i was explaining to him what i had experienced and that i wanted him to keep an eye out on the news for a plane crash near my deer lease. 
   we had been talking for maybe 3 minutes when i notice several helicopters approaching. i could hear them as well as see the navigation strobes. they approached from approximately the north west in no particular formation. once near i counted at least ten helicopters in the immediate area. the oddest thing about their presence was that many of the aircraft had its search light scanning the terrain. they seemed to have been focusing their interest a bit north and west of my location and never came closer than 300-400 yards of my truck. after several minutes of loitering in the area they began to continue westward over a high ridge until out of my sight. the presence of the helicopters urged me to consider two explanations to the event. either an aircraft crashed and didn't make a sound, extinguished itself after approximately 4 or 5 minutes, and incinerated itself to-where no evidence was left behind. or, i had witnessed a ufo of some sorts and the attempt of several military aircraft to find it and or track it. 
   i don't know what i saw that night, but i know many things it wasn't. the object seemed to be hovering near the ground but at the time i couldn't tell how near. the next day i re-traced my step as best as i could. most of the area tree wise is made up of mesquites with hardwoods sporadically sprinkled in. the common characteristic of a mesquite tree is that is doesn't grow nearly as tall as lets say an oak. the terrain in other words was fairly low. from ground level the average tree line could be anywhere from 12-20' tall with the occasional hardwood tree cluster being considerable taller. whatever i witnessed never appeared above the trees, but at the same time it didn���t appear to be on the ground and or stable in movement. it seemed to float in a specific area not so much swaying but increasing and decreasing in size as the intensity of the light pulsated, never blinking or strobing, but pulsing slowly shades of white and orange-red. 
   i would like to stress that i never got an un-obstructed view of the object and that i make no claims as to what it was other than "un-identifiable. i did find the presence of so many helicopters in the immediate area so quickly very conspicuous and interesting and that is the only motivation to file this report. anybody can claim they saw something in the sky that can't be substantiated by third parties. military aircraft, or any earth bound aircraft for that matter can't fly without leaving evidence of their actions. i also so think it's interesting all this happened in such close proximity to a military training facility. the national guard training grounds are just a few miles up the road on the west side of cr 267. this event was certainly in a civilian area but close enough to military instillations to cause me concern.
   i doubt this has any bearing but i do remember as i was on the phone and as the helicopters were leaving the area, a white ford diesel coming from the opposite direction passed me heading south towards cr574.
content.summary: Brilliant lights, low altitude, near military traing fac., followed by military hellicopters with search lights.

content.detailedDescription: I left the old village bakery on mound rd. in warren mi. at 4:30 am. i am the delivery person for that company i was doing a delivery to our store at 18 mile and rochester rd. i drove mound rd. to 17 mile rd. and went do west when i came to dequinder i noticed in the sky a sguigly line that was darting back and fourth. as i got closer to rochester rd. i noticed the sguiglly line was kinda stationary and as i approached rochester rd. and stopped at the light the sgiugly line darted back and fouth within a 6 to 10 inch pattern as looking in the sky at about a 30 degree angle. as i watched and the light in the sky the light changed for me to go i turned right and the sguigly seem to follow in the same direction i was going for about a hundred feet then zipped off do south then was gone. then there was the the red buld shaped objects that where darting or bouncing in and out of the tree lines for a couple hundred yards and then gone.( this was after the sguigly line had dissappeared) thats not all as i was going down mound as i was driving to the rochester store the little red bulds i swear was following me because whats weird is every light that i went thru the transformers were blowing up as i was goin to 17 mile and i was observing these 2 little red bulbs. i am guessing you should be able to contact the power co. about the transformers going on the fritz that morning. those red bulbs i oserved a couple of different times. i dont know what going on but i am kinda getting the feeling something is not right. please have someone contact me. i will be home during the day of 4/14/08 until 5pm then i have a presentation to do in school till 9pm and then someone can call after 9:30 pm too.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: The exact squiglly light shown on ufo hunter on the history chanel date of april 13 at 11pm detroit mi. time. i mean the exact footage.

content.detailedDescription:
1.) i've been staying with family for a few weeks at they're residence
2.) i smoke cigarette's on the front porch and being it's out in the country i'm always star gazing while i'm out there. this night it was extremely clear out and as soon as i went outside i noticed a very bright light out in the distance that i've never seen. 
3.) initially i thought the object was an aircraft or helicopper but it was too bright to be either. i continued to look closely at the object and noticed it seemed to be mutlicolored. it moved as though it was hovering. moving slowly up and down and side to side. i went into the house to find out if a meteor or maybe a planet was set to be in the sky but found nothing. two different times i noticed the horizon lit up below it. it wasn't a beam of light and it didn't appear to come from the object but both happenings i've never witnessed while i've been up here. to make sure i wasn't crazy i grabbed a few of my family members to take a look at the object. they agreed the object in the sky wasn't an aircraft and something they couldn't quite explain. after a few minutes they went back inside because they were a little creeped out by it. after 20 minutes of watching it i went back inside and watched a little tv. within about a 45 minute time period and checking the object twice, on the third check it was gone. 
4.) multicolored (changing colors slowly, almost wave like), circular, and the movement seemed to be somewhat slow from a distance but was moving side to side and up and down but the movements were spiradic.
5.) initially, i felt fine but after i realized it wasn't an aircraft or anything like that it made me feel a little tense. it wasn't anything i've ever seen before. 
6.) when i came outside the third time it was gone
content.summary: Multicolored, circular, hovering motion

content.detailedDescription: On december 31st my wife,son,father,father in law, and myself were deer hunting on a secluded ranch in schleicher county tx. that evening my wife took her first deer and we brung the animal back to camp and rounded everyone up from the evening hunt. my wife and son went into the cabin to start dinner as my dad and my father in law and i cleaned the buck. it was just after dark about 7:15 in the evening as we wrapped up with the deer.  as the three of us walked from our cleaning table to the cabin my father in law said "look at that shooting star."  when i looked up to the north in the sky what i saw still makes my hair stand on end.  as i looked up i saw three balls of yellow light moving from east to west i would guess it was within a hundred miles and about the size of a beer bottle cap at arms length in the sky. they were moving maybe faster than a plane but not streaking fast. the objects were perfectly spaced apart and moving together slightly upward from east to west. my father and i looked at each other with shock and disbelief.  the yellow balls moved across the sky for about 15 to 20 seconds and then what happened i still cannot understand or rationalize.  i don't believe or disbelieve in these things but i wish i had not seen this and it still bothers me very much.  as the three balls of light moved across the sky they had a light blue glow around the outside of the three and suddenly the first ball punched a hole into the sky. i know that sounds unimaginable but it is the only way i know to describe it.  it was like throwing a ball into black water. when the first ball flashed out of sight the other two followed so fast they looked like a solid streak of yellow light. when the streak of light went into the "hole in the sky" it flashed shut and a purple blip of light shot across the sky in both directions for what i guess to be hundreds of miles.  it looked like when you turn off a television and that purple line shoots across the screen.  i have seen dozens of shooting stars and meteors. i have seen the shuttle come back in a couple of times. i got to see haley's comet when i was a kid but i have never seen anything at all like what i saw that night. i think about it a lot and as many guys that deer hunt that area that time of year i know my dad and father in law and i were not the only ones to see it.  i don't know what we seen that night but i cannot imagine that it was man made.
content.summary: Three round objects illuminated in yellow moving together

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the steps of my deck in the backyard, right after twilight. i was just looking up into the eastern sky, watching planes go by, and looking at what stars i could see. it was about 8:25 pm when i saw something that looked at first like it was an airplane without the red & blue wing lights. it was a large bright light. as i paid closer attention, i realized that the brightness of the light couldn't be a plane because at the size of the light, i should have been able to hear a plane. i had been watching and listening to them all night, as they flew through the sky. because of the nearby mountains, the sounds of the planes are very discernable. the bright light made no noise, and i started to think that it was just a super bright planet that i maybe hadn't noticed earlier, when i then realized that it had moved. it dipped down and then moved in a horizontal manner to the south, then it stopped and seemed to be hovering, as the light was not increasing or decreasing in size. then it dipped again and moved horizontally again. this is about when i started to think it was maybe something really strange but i didn't know how long it would be up in the sky, and i was afraid to go grab my camera. i didn't want to take my eyes off of the bright light in the sky. the object then dipped and moved about one or two more times, and then i watched as the light started to dim and then disappear entirely into a tiny dot and then vanished, without the sense that it had flown away. it simply faded away. i ran into the house at this point and called my husband on the phone. it was 8:28 pm when i called him. the whole "event" only lasted a few minutes. i didn't see the object again. i've seen meteor showers, a comet and many different planes and helicopters because i live between two international airports. the thing i watched in the sky didn't behave like anything i have ever seen in the night sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large bright light that moved in a strange way, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Well we left the house around 9-9:30pm. i was taking a friend home driving down the road that is adjacent to my driveway. about half a mile into our drive, i saw 1 huge light and 2 smaller but still huge lights above the trees about a few yards away from eachother. and about 30 feet above the trees. i thought it might of been a plane so i slowed down and rolled down my window to see if they were planes cause we live in the flight path toward the airport in portland. i rolled my window down and stuck my head out the window and didn't hear anything. it was totally quiet. no plane engine or helicopter propeller sounds. plus it was way too close to the trees to be a plane and way too big. it making any motions or changing paths, it was just in the same place for a while. i thought i would drive further down the road and see if we can get closer to see what it was. we passed a couple trees in our eyesite and when we turned the corner it was gone. i drove all the way up to where they would of been and they were gone. i drove home and told my parents. i was pretty excited.
content.summary: 3 huge lights above trees

content.detailedDescription: It was moving very fast in a sothern direction. very bright like a star. was not blinking or pulsating or changing colors. as i watched it began to dim and then disappeared completely.
content.summary: Bright light moving very fast across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I don't remember the exact date, but this occurred in mid to late january of this year.  i hesitated to share this because i don't want to be considered a crack-pot by my community, but i just have to tell someone.  my husband and i were on our way back home after attending a retirement seminar at the monument inn restarant near baytown, texas.  it was a very dark night, with no moon.  we were eastbound of hwy 565 south between 9-9:30pm.  we came to the 4-way stop at the intersection of 565s, and hwy.3180 just south of mont belvieu, texas.  while we were at the stop sign i saw a triangular object come up fast on our left.  it was flying low, approx. 10-15ft. off the ground.  it slowed and hovered next to our vehicle probably 3 car lengths to our left for 15-20 seconds, then at a very high rate of speed shot off at a 45 degree angle away from us headed north/northeast cruising low over the housetops along 3180 before we lost sight of it.  it was headed in the direction of an area of new construction where rice fields had existed in the recent past.  i asked my husband what that was,...Could it have been a plane, and he said "planes can't move that fast".  i asked him to turn north along 3180 and follow it to see if it had crashed, but he said "no, lets go home".  (he now says he doesn't remember seeing anything and denies saying it was faster than a plane. he is in denial, but i remember vividly what it looked like.) 
the object was totally silent...It made no noise at all.  the inside area of the triangle was very dark...Emitting no light, (almost as though it absorbed it) yet the outside perimeter of the vehicle was encased in a glowing cylidrical neon green light source.  the neon glow extended out away from the craft, but the light didn't reveal details as to the structure of the inner area of the triangle.
did anyone else see anything like it in our area?  i know that people had seen some strange things in the sky around stephenville, texas earlier in january, but the newspaper didn't describe anything like what i saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A triangular object flying low in january, 2008, hovered as close as 3 car lengths away from us while we were at a stop sign.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi

   i just want to report a ufo that my 2 friends and i saw in the late 1980's,   i email many places but not once got any feedback , and am not asking for anybody to believe my story but i just want to know if anybody alse reported seeing anything in montreal canada, 

         i was about 8 or 9 years old  it must of been in 1988 to maybe 1990  we dont remember exactly , i was playing on the streets with my older sister and a friend , when all of a sudden we heard a loud buzzing noise , a constant noise ,    when right on top of us we saw a  oval shapped object with many lights around it  flying slowly , but the thing that feaks me out the most is that it was so low and i live right next to a busy highway , so there must of been thousands of people who saw it  ,  the object was travaling east at at very slow pace    , and we could of seen it perfectly , just like a cartoon ,  other then the buzzing noise there was no smoke  just lights   when all of sudden   the ufo just flu back where it came from and that was it ,  

    am not asking for anybody to believe me cause i wouldnt myself but am just looking for answers  and if anybody alse seen it , i did many researce and i heard of a story on are news paper that there was a sighting near the olympic stadium  in the 1990's    i just wanted to know if you had any information , 

        i also called a couple of doctors to hypnotize me because i wanted find a way to prove it  , but i also wanted to know ,where can i go to get a lie decting test done

          please send me any information   about this

                     thank you 

montreal,canada,
content.summary: Oval , with light all around  making a loud buzzing sound

content.detailedDescription: looked up as i was leaving my house and saw the object "floating" and changing shape in the air. the object appeared to be at about 2000ft. in the air. the object resembled an extremely large plastic bag to the naked eye. the object appeared to tumble and changed shape. it "floated" slowly over the house for ~20 minutes and slowly moved off the the northeast and dissappeared behind the horizon. there was no noise. i watched the history channel tonight and saw a very similar object that was filmed in stephensville tx at night. this prompted me to send it in. i took the pictures with a digital camera with a tripod. the images i am sending had 12x digital zoom. i have 16 other images. i did not use the digital zoom on all of the images to try and preserve the resolution. i would like to remain anonymous due to my occupation. feel free to give me a call.  (these are additional pictures that i took.  the pictures that appear illuminated were the sun shining on the object at ~12:00 noon.)
content.summary: Saw object "floating" about 2000 ft. in the air; look like a large plastic bag to the naked eye but too large at that altitude to be something common

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north on angeles crest highway before getting to 210 west onramp
spotted very bright lights in mountain gap above la tuna canyon road.
thought it must be aircraft from burbank airport.  at pennsylvania ave
offramp got off and pulled onto altura road.  got out of car.
objects were 5-6 glowing orbs (like seen on history channel in phoenix)
could not beleive other people did not see them.  they acted like they
were playing--they would seperate then come together.  observed them to
2 north freeway--they were not going fast.  maybe 40 mph.  i am a licensed
aircraft mechanic and know port and starboard lights used by airplanes--
had none.  told family and friends did not beleive me.
objects had multi-colored lights and were just south of 210 freeway
this is my second encounter with ufo's
content.summary: Coming home from work saw orbs just south of 210 freeway

content.detailedDescription: We are visiting my mother in laws on the east side of tucson out on the back pattio about 6:15 i am looking up at a half moon tonight and then i spotted a bright object off to the left of the moon - we are facing east - about 4 fingers to the left of the moon with out streched arm. we watched it for 8 to 10 minutes through binocks & spotting scope = looked full round as apposed to half moon = brighter than the moon and then to my naked eye appeared to wink out. my father in law still had the scope on it and said it appeared to him to get smaller then gone. was stationary in sky the whole time.That is it. hope someone else saw it.Nothing else in the sky as it was still light out.
content.summary: Looked like a star but too early

content.detailedDescription:
After visiting carlsbad caverns new mexico, my family and i spotted
a bright cigar shaped object with visible port holes staying with us
about one fourth of a mile away and about 45 degrees in elevation.
it stayed with us for about 10 minutes and then sped off in a
very high rate of speed (almost in a flash).  i was 8-9 years old
but remember it very well.  i think we were going north at about 60 mph
maybe 25 miles in the desert from the caverns.  this is the first of 
two encounters i have had.
content.summary: After visiting carlsbad caverns, my family observed cigar shaped object with visible port holes

content.detailedDescription: Did not see the oject while taking the photo, and to my knoledge nobody at the site did either!
content.summary: Did not see untill developed photo

content.detailedDescription: I was just laying back on my bed to my surprise moon is out so i kept looking for a moment longer then i would have when a shiny green diamond like object cruises across my field of view maybe a 1/4 mile? (about full city block) away about 200 ft up? i snapped up at fast first and looked  laughed thought it was runaway balloon. but kept watching carefully to see actually it was like an 8 sided emerald and very flat edge metallic shiny reflective green. had white prtusion that was perfectly straight down and far thicker then a string. that's what gave me the clue it was so easy to see a string that far away? why if it was perfectly horizontally across my field of view at maybe 50 miles an hour, while rotating, then was the string not flapping or moving how come i see it?  watched it until i couldn't see any longer. flight path and consistent speed of rotation made me believe something very odd. still could be talked into believing it's a strange balloon.
content.summary: Green emerald metallic maybe eight sided? diamond  white protrusion on bottom

content.detailedDescription:
Lake oswego, oregon
george rogers park
february 1977 , about 10pm

after park closing time.
15 minutes after the last car pulls out of the parking lot, my girlfriend and i were standing on the footbridge that crosses sucker creek (now known as oswego creek).

we were facing the willamette river, looking in the direction towards oregon city. it was a cloudless night and i looked up at the stars.

i noticed one of the "stars" appeared to be moving. "look over there - a satellite" i said to my girlfriend.

we stood on the bridge and watched it move along for a minute or so. it seemed like the closer it moved in our direction, the lower in altitude it was. it was at about a 65 degree angle to us originally, now it was obviously not a satellite. it was flying above the willamette river, following the river's path towards portland.

we walked to the end of the footbridge to watch it. the object was now directly over the river from the park.

at this point the object slowed way down and was no longer just a light in the sky.

it looked to be about as large as small plane or a car.

the object appeared round on the underside and had a slight metallic shine. it emitted a slightly greenish/blue light around it, but you couldn't tell where it was coming from.

for a few seconds, the object seemed to change shape towards the top of it. to my eyes, it appeared to take on the shape of a dark greenish angel with a gargoyle type face, then changed back to the disc shape again.

i could hear a very low pitched humming noise coming from it. not real loud. you could "feel" the noise more than you could hear it.

at this moment the object changed directions and flew towards us at a very slow speed.

it flew what appeared to be maybe 15-20 feet above the old iron furnace and stopped to the left side of it.

we are off the footbridge now and are standing in the parking lot.

after the object stopped moving, it seemed to take on a brighter bluish color. it seemed to not come from it, but around it.

we stood there stupefied. i instantly knew that "they" (whatever "they" were) knew we were watching.

the object seemed to be bathing us in this bluish light. i felt warm all over.

at this point i seemed to have some sort of telepathic contact with the object.

i could not hear an actual voice in my head, but more like the feeling of an instant memory. that's about as close as i can describe it.

some of what i remember them "saying":
they were in the area to examine the atmosphere.
they were on this earth to witness the second coming of christ.

at this point, i had a dis-belief of what i was seeing and the "voice" said, "here is a signal to you, so that you will know we were really here."

at the very moment i "heard" this, small green lights lit up on the object. starting at the bottom right, and coming on one at a time until it reached the top. then two larger red lights in the center of the object came on and flashed a few times.

then the "voice" said, "we are going to come down to you into the parking lot and take you up with us."

at that moment i was terrified and thought back to them "if you do that, i will go insane!"

at the very moment i thought this, the blue light that was bathing us turned off and i was cooler again. the red lights went out and then the green lights went out one at a time (in the opposite direction they came on).

the object then started shaking violently back and forth, then shot at extremely fast speed down and to the right.

i thought to myself "oh no, it's going to crash!" it flew behind a tree but i raced out into the parking lot to see it going down.

right before it would have crashed, the object sort of melted (heat-wave look) away into nothing and was gone.

my girlfriend later said she could not remember anything that happened after the blue light hit us. she said she felt frozen in her footsteps and could not move until the object was gone.

the next day i had a slight sunburn on my face even though it was february.

see attached pictures for more info
content.summary: Disc with bluish glow, small green lights with a few red flashing

content.detailedDescription: One fall evening a group of neighbors were meeting in the front yard of the ranch house in lobo tx 10 miles so. of van horn tx when i noticed a evening star between two peaks near the so. horizon over the old river road. i began to notice it was coming closer and larger.  i went inside to get my little set of 10 x 10 and a neighbor had her 10 x 50s. by this time it was getting bigger and bigger still just a very bright light. there were children and they were frightened and it was getting very chilly and dark.  inside on the south side of the house were two very large windows. we were switching the glasses around so everyone could see.. some couldnt find it but when i received the big glasses ..Whow..I saw a sometimes flat saucer shape and other times a football shape as i suppose it turned up and down.  a few minutes later it was close enough to see the real thing...It was huge with a ring of flashing green lights around the top of the saucer and flashing blue lights on the bottom or vise versa but it had red firing jettisons from top and bottom on each end and i was amazed to see across the top it appeared to be a halo. some entense bright light coming out of the top. it was very colorful and very active. there wasnt supposed to be a star between those two peaks but there it was.  why have i written this?  i am 71 and know it needs to be told before i die or loose my mind.  this is fact and people can go to the west usa and do their own searching but take something powerful to look through..I visited my sister in alpine texas and noticed a pink glow to an eradic moving star and before i could get my sister it dashed behind another star.. look for a pink glow that moves..Stars dont move.  i suppose the pink cast color comes from the jettisons. stars are very white white with a tinze of blue..People in phoenix aiz. do it this way. they get a blanket a dusk and the kids and pets and lay there watching all the activity in the nite sky..It is a family fun evening.  try it sometime.
content.summary: It was a star near the horizon that keep coming closer.  thru 10x50 s  we watched it become a huge space ship with multi color lights

content.detailedDescription:
It was new years eve, december 31 1995.  i had just shown up to a co-workers house on shrader in san francisco for a party.  i was there for only a few minutes and went out to the back porch to have a cigarette.  i was looking west at the night sky wich was uncommonly clear for san francisco in december.  i could see allot of stars.  i wasnt drunk (yet) as i just started my new years eve festivities nor do i use any other substance other than alcohol.

so as i was enjoying my cigarette while looking up into the sky, i noticed a slow moving pin of light.  i thought i was watching a sattlelite in orbit as i have seen many of those while camping.  it looked simular.  i watched it move north to south direction for about six to seven seconds not thinking much of it, but then to my suprise it took a sharp angle turn towards the west as it speed up quickly.  it then took another sharp turn east and then another north.  the three sharp turns and distance traveled were done in under 2 seconds.  after the turns it then shot out into space, away from earth at very fast speed.  it kind of looked like a shooting star, but in reverse direction..Going away from the planet.

i have been telling people my siting for years but just now stumbled across this web site so figured i would post it.  i have been looking upward ever since and was always a star gazer before, but i have never seen anything like it before or after my new years eve siting.  i do watch those sattlelites a little closer now..See if they are going to do something interesting, but no luck.
content.summary: Looked like sattlelight moving in orbit, but make sharp angle turns and speed off.

content.detailedDescription:
Around midnight august 12 going on to the 13th, 1978, in abingdon, maryland, usa, i was observing the annual perseid meteor shower. i am an amateur astronomer, and have studied this all my life. i love the night sky. it has always entranced me. while in the front yard looking for meteors, my mom spotted it first. it was a glowing blue disk about twice the size of the full moon, with a bubble of some sort on top. it was impossible to say how big or how far away it was, since there were no points of reference to go by. it was practically edge on and about 60 degrees altitude above the horizon in the southeastern sky. it was clearly 3-dimensional and seemed to be stationary or to hover for a minute. then it moved in a slow circular pattern before streaking off toward the northeast at an unbelievable speed. that was the last we saw of it. my original drawings have since disappeared. my memories haven't. i never forgot that night. 
since then, many things have revealed themselves to me, that makes me believe that my life is somehow tied into that event. it was clearly meant for me to see that ufo. there is more that i could say, but this will suffice for now. i have only recently been compelled to get my story out. my mom reported this to the nearby army base after it happened, but no one ever followed up, to my knowledge. i believe i may be responsible for that ufo appearing on that night in that place. there is more, but first read my entire previous email  to get the big picture. the hoofbeats of the event that spawned my synchronicities are getting louder everyday. please see my webpage for the complete truth, stories, and poem relating to this in my life:
http://www.Authorsden.Com/johnrcoppolella
starman4@bellsouth.Net
content.summary: Saw glowing  blue disk like mufon homepage graphic appear and hover

content.detailedDescription: After ˇ800 continous shots from sky, object appears on two pictures, nothing unusual seen with naked eye.
content.summary: Strange object
